name: Kershaw Deschutes Axe/Hatchet
description: Buck down some wood and get your campfire roaring. Kershaw’s Deschutes Hatchet packs a lot of chopping power into a compact package, making short work of logs and kindling. The sheath has a shoulder strap to carry it when your arms are loaded with firewood. And, the semi-bearded design allows different grips for fine cuts, great for making roasting sticks.Rugged glass-reinforced nylon handle has rubber panels to add grip and absorb shock.Durable black oxide coating wears well and prevents corrosion.3CR13 blade steel is tough and easy to sharpen.Full-tang construction adds strength and rigidity.Jimping on the hammer side of the axe head for improved control while batoning.Rigid nylon sheath has an integrated shoulder strap.
